config.neo4j.cypher.topic.adults: MERGE (t:Address {parcel_id: event.address.parcel_id}) ON CREATE SET t += {parcel_id: event.address.parcel_id, street_1: event.address.street_1, street_2: event.address.street_2, town: event.address.town, county: event.address.county, province: event.address.province, country: event.address.country, postal_code: event.address.postal_code, country_code: event.address.country_code, neighbourhood: event.address.neighbourhood} ON MATCH SET t += { street_1: event.address.street_1, street_2: event.address.street_2, town: event.address.town, county: event.address.county, province: event.address.province, country: event.address.country, postal_code: event.address.postal_code, country_code: event.address.country_code, neighbourhood: event.address.neighbourhood}
